languages.text: "В отличие от Вольных Торговцев, которым священные {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Патенты{/g} помогают обходить даже законы Великого, агенты Касбаллики привыкли скрываться и заметать следы. Никто не хочет привлекать к себе лишнее внимание кого б то ни было... тем более что у Простора теперь в комендантах один из воинов {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Золотого Трона{/g}".

traits.locale_text: "В отличие от Вольных Торговцев, которым священные {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Патенты{/g} помогают обходить даже законы Великого, агенты Касбаллики привыкли скрываться и заметать следы. Никто не хочет привлекать к себе лишнее внимание кого б то ни было... тем более что у Простора теперь в комендантах один из воинов {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Золотого Трона{/g}".
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Unlike the Rogue Traders whose sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrants{/g} make them immune even from the laws of the Exalted One, Kasballican agents are used to hiding and covering their tracks. Nobody wants to draw unwanted attention, no matter who might take an interest... Especially now that the Koronus Expanse has a warrior of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g} as its watchman."
languages.original_text: "В отличие от Вольных Торговцев, которым священные {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Патенты{/g} помогают обходить даже законы Великого, агенты Касбаллики привыкли скрываться и заметать следы. Никто не хочет привлекать к себе лишнее внимание кого б то ни было... тем более что у Простора теперь в комендантах один из воинов {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Золотого Трона{/g}".

traits.locale_text: "Unlike the Rogue Traders whose sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrants{/g} make them immune even to the laws of the Great One, Kasballican agents are used to hiding and covering their tracks. Nobody wants to draw unwanted attention, no matter who might take interest... Especially now that the Koronus Expanse features a warrior of the Golden Throne as its custodian."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

Nobody wants to draw unwanted attention, no matter who might take an interest... Especially now that the Koronus Expanse has a warrior of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g} as its watchman."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “行商浪人拥有神圣的{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}授状{/g}，他们甚至可以忽视至高无上的神皇制定的律法。但卡斯巴利卡的代理人并非如此，他们习惯隐藏、掩盖他们的足迹。没人愿意引起不必要的注意，无论是谁的注意……尤其是这种时候，科罗努斯扩区迎来了一位{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金王座{/g}的战士，守望这片星区。”
languages.original_text: "Unlike the Rogue Traders whose sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrants{/g} make them immune even from the laws of the Exalted One, Kasballican agents are used to hiding and covering their tracks. Nobody wants to draw unwanted attention, no matter who might take an interest... Especially now that the Koronus Expanse has a warrior of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g} as its watchman."

traits.locale_text: “行商浪人拥有神圣的{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}许可证{/g}，他们甚至可以忽视至高无上的神皇制定的律法。但卡斯巴利卡的代理人并非如此，他们习惯隐藏、掩盖他们的足迹。没人愿意引起不必要的注意，无论是谁的注意……尤其是这种时候，科罗努斯扩区迎来了一位{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金王座{/g}的战士，守望这片星区。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "Unlike the Rogue Traders whose sacred Warrants make them immune even to the laws of the Exalted One, Kasballican agents are used to hiding and covering their tracks. Nobody wants to draw unwanted attention, no matter who might take an interest... Especially now that the Koronus Expanse has a warrior of the Golden Throne as its watchman."

languages.text: «Al contrario que los Comerciantes Independientes, que son inmunes a las leyes del Exaltado con sus {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Patentes{/g} sagradas, los agentes de la Kasballica están acostumbrados a esconderse y borrar sus huellas. Nadie quiere llamar la atención, sin importar a quién pueda interesarle... Especialmente ahora que la Extensión de Koronus tiene a una guerrera del {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trono Dorado{/g} como guardiana».
languages.original_text: "Unlike the Rogue Traders whose sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrants{/g} make them immune even from the laws of the Exalted One, Kasballican agents are used to hiding and covering their tracks. Nobody wants to draw unwanted attention, no matter who might take an interest... Especially now that the Koronus Expanse has a warrior of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g} as its watchman."

traits.locale_text: «Al contrario que los Comerciantes Independientes, que son inmunes a las leyes del Exaltado con sus {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Patentes{/g} sagradas, los agentes de la Kasballica están acostumbrados a esconderse y borrar sus huellas. Nadie quiere llamar la atención, sin importar a quién pueda interesarle... Especialmente ahora que la Extensión de Koronus tiene a una guerrera del {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trono Dorado{/g} como guardiana».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「神聖な{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}令状{/g}によって、エグザルテッド・ワンの法さえも免除される自由開拓者とは異なって、カスバリカのエージェントは身を隠し、足跡を消すことに慣れているんだよ。誰であろうと、不要な注意も関心も引きたくないんだ…特に今、コロヌス・エクスパンスには{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金の玉座{/g}の戦士が番人として滞在しているしね」
languages.original_text: "Unlike the Rogue Traders whose sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrants{/g} make them immune even from the laws of the Exalted One, Kasballican agents are used to hiding and covering their tracks. Nobody wants to draw unwanted attention, no matter who might take an interest... Especially now that the Koronus Expanse has a warrior of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g} as its watchman."

traits.locale_text: 「神聖な{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}令状{/g}によって、エグザルテッド・ワンの法さえも免除される自由開拓者とは異なって、カスバリカのエージェントは身を隠し、足跡を消すことに慣れているんだよ。誰であろうと、不要な注意も関心も引きたくないんだ…特に今、コロヌス・エクスパンスには{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金の玉座{/g}の戦士が番人として滞在しているしね」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Freihändler sind dank ihrer heiligen {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Handelsbriefe{/g} selbst gegen die Gesetze des Erhabenen immun. Kasballica-Agenten dagegen sind es gewohnt, sich zu verstecken und ihre Spuren zu verwischen. Niemand will ungewünschte Aufmerksamkeit auf sich ziehen, gleich von wem ... Besonders jetzt, da die Koronus-Ausdehnung von einem Krieger des {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Goldenen Throns{/g} bewacht wird."
languages.original_text: "Unlike the Rogue Traders whose sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrants{/g} make them immune even from the laws of the Exalted One, Kasballican agents are used to hiding and covering their tracks. Nobody wants to draw unwanted attention, no matter who might take an interest... Especially now that the Koronus Expanse has a warrior of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g} as its watchman."

traits.locale_text: "Freihändler sind dank ihrer heiligen {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Handelsbriefe{/g} selbst gegen die Gesetze des Erhabenen immun. Kasballica-Agenten dagegen sind es gewohnt, sich zu verstecken und ihre Spuren zu verwischen. Niemand will ungewünschte Aufmerksamkeit auf sich ziehen, gleich von wem ... Besonders jetzt, da die Koronus-Ausdehnung von einem Krieger des {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Goldenen Throns{/g} bewacht wird."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Contrairement aux libres-marchands, qui bénéficient d'une immunité contre toutes les lois, même celles de l'Exalté, grâce à leurs {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}lettres de marque{/g} sacrées, les agents de la Kasballica ont l'habitude de se cacher et d'effacer leurs traces. Personne ne veut attirer l'attention de qui que ce soit... surtout maintenant que les Étendues de Koronus sont sous la garde {mf|d'un guerrier|d'une guerrière} du {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trône d'Or{/g}. »
languages.original_text: "Unlike the Rogue Traders whose sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrants{/g} make them immune even from the laws of the Exalted One, Kasballican agents are used to hiding and covering their tracks. Nobody wants to draw unwanted attention, no matter who might take an interest... Especially now that the Koronus Expanse has a warrior of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g} as its watchman."

traits.locale_text: « Contrairement aux libres-marchands, qui bénéficient d'une immunité contre toutes les lois, même celles de l'Exalté, grâce à leurs {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}lettres de marque{/g} sacrées, les agents de la Kasballica ont l'habitude de se cacher et d'effacer leurs traces. Personne ne veut attirer l'attention de qui que ce soit... surtout maintenant que les Étendues de Koronus sont sous la garde {mf|d'un guerrier|d'une guerrière} du {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trône d'Or{/g}. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Kutsal {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Ruhsatnameleri{/g} onları Görkemli'nin kanunları karşısında bile dokunulmaz kılan Hür Tacirlerin aksine Kasballica ajanları, gizlenmeye ve izlerini örtmeye alışıktır. İlgilenen kim olursa olsun kimse dikkatleri üzerine çekmek istemez. Hele ki {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Altın Taht'ın{/g} savaşçılarından biri artık Koronus Enginliği'nin bekçiliğini yaparken."
languages.original_text: "Unlike the Rogue Traders whose sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrants{/g} make them immune even from the laws of the Exalted One, Kasballican agents are used to hiding and covering their tracks. Nobody wants to draw unwanted attention, no matter who might take an interest... Especially now that the Koronus Expanse has a warrior of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g} as its watchman."

traits.locale_text: "Kutsal {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Ruhsatname{/g}leri onları Görkemli'nin kanunları karşısında bile dokunulmaz kılan Hür Tacirlerin aksine, Kasballica ajanları gizlenmeye ve izlerini örtmeye alışıktır. İlgilenen kim olursa olsun kimse dikkatleri üzerine çekmek istemez. Özellikle de {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Altın Taht{/g}'ın savaşçılarından biri artık Koronus Enginliği'nin bekçiliğini yaparken."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
